column5: Just wondering if anyone can help me out with finding a decent place to rent a boat on Simcoe. My boats not holding up right now and dont want to bring it any help would be great.
The only place I know is the Blue Beacon Marine at the narrows in Orillia.
AHHHHHHHH One of the guys here will take you out.
Thanks fish farmer.  Sorry about the spelling error on Simcoe i am using my phone.

Here are a couple of places I found by doing a search...was actually just looking too as I want to take my son out for the Barrie Fishing Festival.  Lake Simcoe Marine  Bonnie Boats  Never used them though so can't recommend. But hope it helps!
pasadena marina on the east side of cooks bay rents them....or at least they did last year...
